title: Is it worthwhile attending a university remotely during the COVID-19 pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: University will narrow your ability to think openly without constraints. You will believe what they teach you. You will become their slave. You will become a conformist. Drop out. Live free. Fuck university.

Good question. If I were a freshman though who signed up for the major college or university experience, I would just take all of my college pre requisites for 2 yrs at a community or Jr College. Then when this is all over and settled, transfer to the major university. Your degree/diploma will still say you graduated from your initial choice anyways. Different approach though if this is my jr or senior yr in college. Then yes, I would take my online majors via computer.
